modName: CS Craftable Soul Gems Revised - DELETED
summary: Revision of T-Mush-S\'s CS Soul Fragments to Soul Gems. You can make petty soul gems from soul gem fragments, and upgrade soul gems based on your enchanting skill. Both vanilla and ACE enchanting versions available
descriptionHtml:
I have edited T-Mush-S\'s CS Soul Fragments to Soul Gems mod to be a little more interesting. The original mod is here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19063/?

In this mod, you can make \"Polished Soul Gem Fragments\" from any soul gem fragment, you don\'t require any perks to create them. You can then create Petty Soul gems from 2 Polished Fragments, Lesser Soul gems from 2 Petty Soul gems, and so on. You can also combine a Grand Soul gem and a Daedra Heart to make a Black soul gem. If you have the relevant perks. There is also a version if you have ACE Enchanting. ACE - Combat Skills is found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10037/?

If you have the vanilla version you can create:
-Petty Gems if you have Enchanter 1
-Lesser Gems if you have Enchanter 2
-Common Gems if you have Enchanter 3
-Greater Gems if you have Enchanter 4
-Grand Gems if you have Enchanter 5
-Black Gems if you have Enchanter 5 and Arcane Blacksmith

If you have the ACE enchanting version you can create:
-Petty and Lesser Gems if you have Enchanter 1
-Common and Greater Gems if you have Enchanter 2
-Grand Gems if you have Enchanter 3
-Black Gems if you have Enchanter 3 and Arcane Blacksmith

Installation:
-Simply install with NMM
Uninstallation:
-Simply uninstall with NMM


Credits-
-T-Mush-S for original mod
-Athyra for ACE - Combat Skills
-Bethesda for an EPIC GAME
author: IronDusk33
